# Our fragrances

## Of intrigue and exception

Ten aromas composed for curious minds—and noses—reveal their stories via
scent.

Discover fragrances _rightArrow_

## Skin Care+

Certain ingredients are needed to support the architecture of the skin,
promoting robustness and resilience. From our Skin Care+ range, potent
providers are on hand to help skin meet a host of daily pressures, providing
round-the-clock support.

Discover Skin Care+ _rightArrow_

chevron

1 / 2

chevron

pauseSlim

## Our personal scents

chevron

##### Miraceti Eau de Parfum

Resinous, woody, spicy fragrance

##### Rōzu Eau de Parfum

Floral, green and woody

##### Ouranon Eau de Parfum

Woody, spicy, resinous

##### Gloam Eau de Parfum

Floral, spicy, green

##### Karst Eau de Parfum

Fresh, herbaceous, marine fragrance

chevron

## Familiar fragrances, doubled in volume

### Online only

For those who feel that 1.6 fluid ounces just fly by too quickly, three of our
unorthodox Eaux de Parfum—Tacit, Hwyl and Marrakech Intense—are now available,
exclusively online, in larger 3.3 fluid ounce bottles.

Discover now _rightArrow_

## Efficacious pairings

Our consultants have long combined complementary formulations to effect
additional benefits for the skin. Incorporate this time-honoured practice into
your regimen with our recommended bundles.

Browse Skin Care Bundles _rightArrow_

## A superlative selection

chevron

##### Tacit Ensemble

For those who enjoy citrus aromas

##### Hwyl Ensemble

For those who favour unorthodox aromas

##### Rōzu Ensemble

Vibrant florals and citrus

##### Marrakech Intense Ensemble

Fragrance, body cleanser, body balm

##### Resurrection Aromatique Hand Wash

Gentle cleansing for hard-working hands

##### Geranium Leaf Body Cleanser

A gentle, invigorating gel cleanser

##### Resurrection Aromatique Hand Balm

Citrus, woody and herbaceous aroma

##### Reverence Aromatique Hand Balm

Woody, earthy, smoky aroma

##### Geranium Leaf Body Scrub

Leaves skin feeling fresh, smooth and soft

chevron

## Decoding fragrance

### The Athenaeum

The language of notes, sillage and aromatic profiles allows us to describe
perfume. Discover our guide to selecting a signature fragrance.

Read more _rightArrow_

chevron

chevron

Aesop Williamsburg, New York

## Store Locator

Our consultants are available to host you in-store and provide tailored
guidance on gift purchases.

Find a nearby store _rightArrow_

## For your convenience

### Our online offering

Just as we do in our physical spaces, it is a pleasure to offer real-time
guidance from our consultants online, as well as a range of delivery and
collection options to suit your needs.

Discover our services _rightArrow_

> ‘Fragrance is the voice of inanimate things.’

Mary Webb

#### Certified B Corp

We meet the highest verified standards of social and environmental
performance, transparency and accountability.

#### Leaping Bunny approved

Our formulations are approved as cruelty free under the Cruelty Free
International Leaping Bunny programme.

#### PETA recognition

We appear on PETA's internationally recognised vegan and cruelty-free lists.
